author: Anonymous Beaker
title: incorrect signature
question: hi, i don't want to ask anything too specific that isn't allowed, but im just stuck on trying to correct the signatures for all of the problems. i have 2 signatures, one for each function in the problem, but i seem to be formatting them wrong. if anyone has any suggestions on practice problems or anything from lecture that might help me sort this out that would be greatly appreciated!
student_answer: I always find doing the practice problems of the most recent units to be helpful. I thought the ones from 6b were especially useful.
